welcome_message_body: Welcome to Flower Mound, where the natural beauty of our parks and the charm of our small-town atmosphere await you. Enjoy our scenic landscapes, unique shops, and friendly locals as you explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The first and largest terminal at DFW, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at DFW, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at DFW, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The international terminal at DFW, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at DFW, primarily serving American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: The newest terminal at DFW, serving international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and accept the terms to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments, with state-of-the-art facilities and equipment for efficient handling and processing.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Love Field Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Addison Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Addison Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, offering luxurious amenities and services for a seamless travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Meacham Field Airport houses the ticket counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Meacham Field Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
